original_title: Man sentenced to 110 years in prison for repeated sexual assault of daughter
original_body_lines: The Balapitiya High Court has sentenced a man who was found guilty of serious sexual assault on his eleven-year-old daughter to 110 years in rigorous imprisonment.
The verdict was delivered by Balapitiya High Court Judge Ranga Dissanayake yesterday (June 05).
The defendant, a resident of the Korakeena area of Uragasmanhandiya, had been found guilty of sexually assaulting his own daughter on multiple occasions since 2008.
